mapper.insert: insert into gg_ythcj_ry_wlxx (ID, DATA_FLAG, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, RYXX_ID, RYXM, RYBH, WLPTMC, WM, WLSFH, DZYX, PX) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ryxxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ryxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wlptmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wlsfh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dzyx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{px,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update gg_ythcj_ry_wlxx set ISDEL = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DATA_FLAG = #{dataflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, LRR_SFZH = #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XGR_SFZH = #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XGSJ = date_trunc('second', now()), RYXX_ID = #{ryxxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RYXM = #{ryxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RYBH = #{rybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WLPTMC = #{wlptmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WM = #{wm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WLSFH = #{wlsfh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DZYX = #{dzyx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PX = #{px,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, ISDEL, DATA_FLAG, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, RYXX_ID, RYXM, RYBH, WLPTMC, WM, WLSFH, DZYX, PX from gg_ythcj_ry_wlxx where isdel = 0 and ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, ISDEL, DATA_FLAG, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, RYXX_ID, RYXM, RYBH, WLPTMC, WM, WLSFH, DZYX, PX from gg_ythcj_ry_wlxx
1=1 and isdel = 0
and RYBH = '${rybh}'
